content:
By default each of the sensors on the Circuit Playground and micro:bit devices convert their sensed data to a particular range.
- The Circuit Playground converts its data into a range with a minimum value of 0 and a maximum of 1023. 
- The micro:bit converts its data into a range with a minimum value of 0 and a maximum value of 255.

For some programs, you may want to adjust these ranges to suit your needs.

## Set Scale

The _setScale_ method allows you to override the default range of a sensor. For example, calling [`lightSensor.setScale(0, 100)`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/lightSensor.setScale/) will change the scale of the [`lightSensor.value`(#f78183)](/docs/applab/lightSensor.value/) so that the lowest value (completely dark) is 0, and the highest (fully bright) is 100.
